categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker actors

nodes.text: Geffrey "Geff" Francis, best known as Geff Francis, is a British actor who portrays Frantis Griss in the 2019 film Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker. He is known for playing the titular character's son Michael in the popular British sitcom Desmond's, which ran from 1989 to 1994, and its spin-off series Porkpie (1995–96). Other roles of note include the title character in Channel Four's 1986 miniseries Zastrozzi, A Romance and the Metropolitan Police desk sergeant Viv James in the 2008-10 TV series Ashes to Ashes.
